results.description: Former Arsenal forward Nicklas Bendtner joins Danish champions FC Copenhagen until the end of December.
results.title: Nicklas Bendtner: Former Arsenal forward signs for FC Copenhagen

results.description: Crewe Alexandra sign Norwegian striker Chuma Anene: from Danish Superliga side FC Midtjylland on loan for the rest of the season.
results.shortTitle: Crewe bring in striker Anene on loan
results.title: Chuma Anene: Crewe Alexandra sign striker from FC Midtjylland on loan

thumbnail.altText: Chuma Anene has played in the Russian Premier League and in Macedonia and Kazakhstan, as well as in Norway and Denmark

results.description: Costa Rica international left-back Bryan Oviedo leaves Sunderland for Danish champions FC Copenhagen.
results.title: Bryan Oviedo: Sunderland's Costa Rica left-back leaves for FC Copenhagen

results.description: Danish international Casper Sloth says Scottish football is the "perfect place" for him after signing a two-year deal with Motherwell.
results.shortTitle: Dane Sloth signs on at Motherwell
results.title: Motherwell sign Danish international midfielder Casper Sloth

results.description: Winger Danny Amankwaa exits Hearts six months before the end of his contract to join SonderjyskE in his native Denmark.
results.title: Hearts: Danny Amankwaa leaves for SonderjyskE in search of first-team football

thumbnail.altText: Danny Amankwaa in action for Hearts

results.description: Hearts announce that their captain Perry Kitchen has moved to Danish Superliga side Randers.
results.title: Perry Kitchen leaves Hearts for Danish side Randers

results.description: Fans throw dead rats during the Danish Superliga game between Brondby and FC Copenhagen.
results.shortTitle: Dead rats thrown in Copenhagen derby
results.title: Fans throw dead rats at player during Copenhagen derby

results.description: Bristol City goalkeeper Ivan Lucic will spend the remainder of the season on loan at Danish Superliga side Aalborg.
results.shortTitle: Bristol City's Lucic departs on loan
results.title: Ivan Lucic: Bristol City keeper joins Aalborg on loan

results.description: The BBC Sport Price of Football survey takes at a look at how much football costs in Europe's top leagues.
results.shortTitle: Price of Football: Costly on the Continent?
results.title: Price of Football: How do European leagues compare?
